## 1.0.3 (2025-11-04)


### Bug fixes:

- Only count active persistent objects, not ghosts. @davisagli 

## 1.0.2 (2025-11-04)


### Bug fixes:

- Fix the order of the traceback. @davisagli 
- Show the cumuluative result count instead of the individual matches for each index. @davisagli 

## 1.0.1 (2025-11-03)


### Bug fixes:

- Ignore intersection steps, for clearer output. @davisagli 

## 1.0.0 (2025-11-03)

No significant changes.
